title: Multiobjective Logistics Optimization for Automated ATM Cash Replenishment Process. (arXiv:2304.13671v1 [math.OC])
abstract: In the digital transformation era, integrating digital technology into every aspect of banking operations improves process automation, cost efficiency, and service level improvement. Although logistics for ATM cash is a crucial task that impacts operating costs and consumer satisfaction, there has been little effort to enhance it. Specifically, in Vietnam, with a market of more than 20,000 ATMs nationally, research and technological solutions that can resolve this issue remain scarce. In this paper, we generalized the vehicle routing problem for ATM cash replenishment, suggested a mathematical model and then offered a tool to evaluate various situations. When being evaluated on the simulated dataset, our proposed model and method produced encouraging results with the benefits of cutting ATM cash operating costs.

Title: Multiobjective Logistics Optimization for Automated ATM Cash Replenishment Process. (arXiv:2304.13671v1 [math.OC])
Abstract: In the digital transformation era, integrating digital technology into every aspect of banking operations improves process automation, cost efficiency, and service level improvement. Although logistics for ATM cash is a crucial task that impacts operating costs and consumer satisfaction, there has been little effort to enhance it. Specifically, in Vietnam, with a market of more than 20,000 ATMs nationally, research and technological solutions that can resolve this issue remain scarce. In this paper, we generalized the vehicle routing problem for ATM cash replenishment, suggested a mathematical model and then offered a tool to evaluate various situations. When being evaluated on the simulated dataset, our proposed model and method produced encouraging results with the benefits of cutting ATM cash operating costs.
translated_title: 自动化ATM现金补充流程的多目标物流优化
translated_abstract: 在数字化转型的时代，将数字技术整合到银行运营的各个方面可以改善流程自动化、成本效益和服务水平提升。虽然ATM现金物流是影响运营成本和消费者满意度的重要任务，但却很少有努力来加以改进。特别是在越南，拥有超过2万台ATM的市场上，解决这个问题的研究和技术解决方案仍然较少。在本文中，我们将ATM现金补充的车辆路径问题进行了概括，提出了一个数学模型，然后提供了一个工具来评估各种不同的情况。在模拟数据集上进行评估时，我们提出的模型和方法产生了令人鼓舞的结果，可以削减ATM现金运营成本。
tldr: 本文研究了自动化ATM现金补充流程，提出了一个数学模型并给出了一个工具来评估各种不同的情况。在模拟数据集上，该模型与方法可以削减ATM现金运营成本。
en_tdlr: This paper studies the automated cash replenishment process for ATMs and proposes a mathematical model with a tool to evaluate various situations, which shows encouraging results in cutting operating costs for ATM cash.
